org.apache.sling.oak.server

Class OakSlingRepositoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.sling.jcr.base.NamespaceMappingSupport
      • org.apache.sling.jcr.base.AbstractSlingRepositoryManager
        • org.apache.sling.oak.server.OakSlingRepositoryManager

  • @Reference(name="namespaceMapper",
           referenceInterface=NamespaceMapper.class,
           cardinality=OPTIONAL_MULTIPLE,
           policy=DYNAMIC)
public class OakSlingRepositoryManager
extends AbstractSlingRepositoryManager
    A Sling repository implementation that wraps the Oak OSGi repository implementation from the Oak project.

      • PROPERTY_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE

        @Property(label="Default Workspace",
          description="Name of the workspace to use by default if not is given in any of the login methods. This name is used to implement the SlingRepository.getDefaultWorkspace() method. If this name is empty, a null value is used in JCR calls so that the default workspace provided by the JCR repository is used.")
public static final String PROPERTY_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_LOGIN_ADMIN_ENABLED

        @Property(boolValue=true,
          label="Enable Administrator Login",
          description="Whether to enable or disable the SlingRepository.loginAdministrative method. The default is \'true\'. See http://sling.apache.org/documentation/the-sling-engine/service-authentication.html for information on deprecating and disabling the loginAdministrative method.")
public static final String PROPERTY_LOGIN_ADMIN_ENABLED

      • PROPERTY_ADMIN_USER

        @Property(value="admin",
          label="Administrator",
          description="The user name of the administrative user. This username is used to implement the SlingRepository.loginAdministrative(String)method. It is intended for this user to provide full read/write access to repository.")
public static final String PROPERTY_ADMIN_USER
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceUserMapper

        protected ServiceUserMapper getServiceUserMapper()
        Description copied from class: AbstractSlingRepositoryManager
        Returns the ServiceUserMapper service to map the service name to a service user name.

        The ServiceUserMapper is used to implement the AbstractSlingRepository2.loginService(String, String) method used to replace the AbstractSlingRepository2.loginAdministrative(String) method. If this method returns null and hence the ServiceUserMapperService is not available, the loginService method is not able to login.

        Specified by:
        getServiceUserMapper in class AbstractSlingRepositoryManager
        Returns:
        The ServiceUserMapper service or null if not available.
        See Also:
        AbstractSlingRepository2.loginService(String, String)

      • getNamespaceMapperServices

        protected NamespaceMapper[] getNamespaceMapperServices()
        Description copied from class: NamespaceMappingSupport
        Returns the NamespaceMapper services used by the NamespaceMappingSupport.getNamespaceAwareSession(Session) method to define custom namespaces on sessions.
        Specified by:
        getNamespaceMapperServices in class NamespaceMappingSupport
        Returns:
        the NamespaceMapper services or null if there are none.

      • acquireRepository

        protected javax.jcr.Repository acquireRepository()
        Description copied from class: AbstractSlingRepositoryManager
        Creates the backing JCR repository instances. It is expected for this method to just start the repository.

        This method does not throw any Throwable but instead just returns null if not repository is available. Any problems trying to acquire the repository must be caught and logged as appropriate.

        Specified by:
        acquireRepository in class AbstractSlingRepositoryManager
        Returns:
        The acquired JCR Repository or null if not repository can be acquired.
        See Also:
        AbstractSlingRepositoryManager.start(BundleContext, String, boolean)

      • setup

        protected void setup(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bundleContext,
                     SlingRepository repository)
        Description copied from class: NamespaceMappingSupport
        Sets up the namespace mapping support. This method is called by implementations of this class after having started (or acquired) the backing JCR repository instance.

        This method may be overwritten but must be called from overwriting methods.

        Overrides:
        setup in class NamespaceMappingSupport
        Parameters:
        bundleContext - The OSGi BundleContext to access the framework for namespacing setup
        repository - The SlingRepository to register namespaces on

      • getServiceRegistrationProperties

        Specified by:

        See Also:

      • create

        protected AbstractSlingRepository2 create(org.osgi.framework.Bundle usingBundle)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSlingRepositoryManager
        Creates an instance of the AbstractSlingRepository2 implementation for use by the given usingBundle.

        This method is called when the repository service is requested from within the using bundle for the first time.

        This method is expected to return a new instance on every call.

        Specified by:
        create in class AbstractSlingRepositoryManager
        Parameters:
        usingBundle - The bundle providing from which the repository is requested.
        Returns:
        The AbstractSlingRepository2 implementation instance to be used by the usingBundle.
        See Also:
        AbstractSlingRepositoryManager.registerService()

        Description copied from class: AbstractSlingRepositoryManager
        Cleans up the given AbstractSlingRepository2 instance previously created by the AbstractSlingRepositoryManager.create(Bundle) method.
        Specified by:
        destroy in class AbstractSlingRepositoryManager
        Parameters:
        repositoryServiceInstance - The AbstractSlingRepository2 istance to cleanup.
        See Also:

      • disposeRepository

        protected void disposeRepository(javax.jcr.Repository repository)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSlingRepositoryManager
        Disposes off the given repository.
        Specified by:
        disposeRepository in class AbstractSlingRepositoryManager
        Parameters:
        repository - The repository to be disposed off which is the same as the one returned from AbstractSlingRepositoryManager.acquireRepository().
